summary: This document contains email correspondence between Amanda Kirby and Lisa D Hurd regarding mutual funds and internal communications at Deutsche Bank. The emails indicate a request for a phone call to discuss the posting of mutual funds.

Amanda Kirby requests a phone call with Lisa D Hurd.
